main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Indianapolis, Indiana, on 28 August 1951, identified initially as a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting was reported at 19:11 UTC, The object was reported to have approached from the west, The object was described as hovering in the sky for 1 to 2 minutes, A flame was seen at intervals until the craft disappeared, The Air Force was involved in verifying the sighting.
